identity.name: KSP Cricket
identity.persona: The Night Match - Electric, Precise, Communal
identity.description: A high-octane live score platform that captures the atmosphere of a T20 night match. It blends the precision of data analytics with the raw energy of a stadium.
principles: Fusion: Stadium Atmosphere x Swiss Data Design
Emotion: Every score update should feel like a roar from the crowd
Content: The Score is King. Everything else is secondary
Contrast: Neon data against deep midnight backgrounds

usage.headings: Barlow Condensed (Uppercase, Bold/Black) - Use for Match Titles, Team Names, Key States
usage.body: Manrope (Regular/Medium) - Use for commentary, news, secondary info
usage.numbers: Barlow Condensed (Bold) - Use for Scores, Overs, Run Rates to mimic stadium scoreboards

glassmorphism.rules: Use heavily on 'Live Match' cards. bg-slate-900/70 backdrop-blur-md border-white/10

gradients.rules: Use subtle radial gradients behind key numbers. No linear gradients on buttons.

ScoreCard.description: The core unit. Must look like a physical ticket or stadium display.
ScoreCard.styles: bg-card border border-white/5 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden relative
features: Live pulsing dot for ongoing matches
Team logos (use placeholders if needed but style them)

TelegramWidget.description: A dedicated section to drive subscriptions.

MatchList.description: Masonry or Grid layout of ScoreCards
MatchList.rules: Hero match takes full width (col-span-full). Others take 1/2 or 1/3 width.

icons.custom: Use react-icons/fa for social brands like Telegram

setup: Install dependencies: npm install lucide-react react-icons framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge
Update tailwind.config.js to include the new colors and fonts
Add the Google Fonts link to public/index.html
critical_rules: Do NOT use white backgrounds. This is a dark-mode first app.
Ensure high contrast for scores. 4.5:1 minimum.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all numbers and scores.
Make the 'Live' indicator pulse using CSS or Framer Motion.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click.
Loading States: Use skeletons that match the card layout, not generic spinners.
Data-TestID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'subscribe-btn', 'match-card-1').
No Gradients on Text: It kills readability for scores.
Spacing: Use double the padding you think you need.
